00026 int PlotIntegral::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00027     // For each source,
00028     TH1F* hist=NULL;
00029     std::string name, title;
00030     const IDs::source* source=NULL;
00031     for(SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator i_source = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00032             i_source!=gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); ++i_source){
00033         source=&i_source->first;
00034 
00035         // setup the name and title for the histogram
00036         name="h"+modules::parser::ToCppValid(source->str())+"_integrals";
00037         title="Integral of pulses coming from "+source->str();
00038 
00039         // make a histogram
00040         hist=new TH1F(name.c_str(),title.c_str(),300,0,-1);
00041         hist->SetXTitle("Integral of each pulse (arb. units)");
00042 
00043         // register histogram with list
00044         fPlots[*source]=hist;
00045     }
00046   return 0;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int PlotIntegral::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00050 
00051     PlotList_t::iterator i_plot;
00052     const AnalysedPulseList* pulseList;
00053     const IDs::source* source;
00054     for(SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator i_source = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00055             i_source!=gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); ++i_source){
00056         source=&i_source->first;
00057         pulseList=&i_source->second;
00058 
00059         // Find the corresponding histogram
00060         i_plot=fPlots.find(*source);
00061         if(i_plot==fPlots.end()){
00062             cout<<"PlotIntegral: Error: Unable to find plot for source '"<<*source<<"'"<<endl;
00063             return 1;
00064         }
00065 
00066         // For each TAP 
00067         for(AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator i_pulse=pulseList->begin();
00068                 i_pulse!=pulseList->end();++i_pulse){
00069             // Fill integral histogram
00070             i_plot->second->Fill((*i_pulse)->GetIntegral());
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074   return 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 int PlotIntegral::AfterLastEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00078     for(PlotList_t::iterator i_plot=fPlots.begin();
00079             i_plot!=fPlots.end(); ++i_plot){
00080         i_plot->second->Draw();
00081     }
00082   return 0;
00083 }
